field.name: summary
field.value: Allow validator attributes to be used on parameters and return types

field.name: description
field.value:
Patch to allow validator attributes to used on parameters and return types. Also fixes possible NullReferenceException in IntegerValidator and NullableIntegerValidator if the PropertyInfo value is not set.
This patch is for the MethodValidatorFacility which is being proposed for Castle Contrib. The issue number for that patch will be added once created.

comment.author: ewhauser
comment.text: The patch in contrib is filled under http://support.castleproject.org/projects/CONTRIB/issues/view/CONTRIB-ISSUE-142
